com.cloudia.Database

Class MySQLConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cloudia.Database.MySQLConnector

  • public class MySQLConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Connector. In the MVC model, this is the class responsible of making SQL request. All additionnal request needed should be implemented in this class
